content.text:
# List of mayors of Kingston, Ontario

This is a list of mayors of Kingston, Ontario.

|-

| (b.1928)
|
|-

| Gary Bennett
| (b.date unknown)
|Ontario Progressive Conservative Party candidate in Kingston and the Islands for the 2018 and 2022 provincial elections
|-
| 2000-2003
| Isabel Turner
| (1936–2021)
|Reeve of Kingston Township for 12 years until it was amalgamated into the City of Kingston in 2000
|-

| Harvey Rosen
| (1949–2022)
| After he was mayor, unsuccessfully sought federal and provincial Liberal nominations.
|-
| 2010-2014
| Mark Gerretsen
| (b.1975)
| Son of former mayor John Gerretsen, Represented Kingston as MP
|-
| 2014-
| Bryan Paterson
| (b.1977)
